name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
title: Kamisato Ayaka: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
desc: The heron holds upon the ice on elegant wing.
in_play_description: The Cryo Elemental Infusion created by your Kamisato Ayaka, who has this card equipped, allows the character to which it is attached to deal +1 Cryo DMG.When you switch to Kamisato Ayaka who has this card equipped: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kamisato Ayaka to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: The Cryo Elemental Infusion created by your Kamisato Ayaka, who has this card equipped, allows the character to which it is attached to deal +1 Cryo DMG. When you switch to Kamisato Ayaka, who has this card equipped: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round) (You must have Kamisato Ayaka in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
